You can make a cup of coffee and enjoy the time.Its dimensions is only 20.7"*13"*24.6", NW:24lbs, easy to move and save space.In addition, there are slots on the back of the machine for storing wire.
👚【Large Capacity】Our washer and dryer combo total capacity:17.6 lbs, washer:11 lbs, spin cycle:6.6 lbs, it will be suitable for shirts, jackets, jeans and more.Best choice for portable use.

⏰【Easy to Operate】The simple design allows the user to understand how to use it at a glance, in addition to the simplest instructions to help you use it.Plug it in, put your clothes in, fill with water, select time, turn it on, take it out.The washing machine runs for max of 15 minutes once, and the spin cycle runs for max of 5 minutes once.

🥰【Professional After Sales Team】We have the most professional customer service team at your service, if you have any questions about quality, delivery, operation, etc., please feel free to tell us and we will provide the most suitable solution according to your wishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long hoses and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Took me about 3 months to finally order a portable washer, spinner. Read all reviews, read all I could find and watched videos on them before I decided on this one. It only had 2 reviews but they were both good and also mentioned long hoses and low noise level. Got here very fast, spent the day using it. Put it in the tub and use a bucket to fill it and it drains well in the tub. Was concerned about it being heavy to lift, but it's not at all. Holds a lot, 3-4 jeans, load of sheets, small load of shirts n stuff. The only con I have is clothes get twisted together during wash, but easy fix, I use a big mesh bag to keep that from happening with perm press clothes. The spinner truly does a great job of almost completely drying, so much better than I imagined. Both are very quiet. If the spinner makes noise, rearrange clothes to level them out and don't try spinning a lot at once. It's only 5 mins, that's all that's needed. Other brand reviews talked about being noisy and short hoses, big reason I chose this one. So easy to use and the included lint catcher, just throw in washer, works great. I'm really very happy with it, although it was my first time using it but used it all day catching up on laundry. I don't foresee any problems, very well made, does not look cheaply made at all. I don't write many reviews, usually nothing to shout about, but I do highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect product，worth it
reviews.reviewText: The delivery is fast, very light, does not take up space, easy to install, washing 5 or 6 clothes at a time is not a big problem, the test wash once, the effect is very good, the style is beautiful, the sound is very small, the dehydration is also very fast, the dehydration is also very dry, greatly saving the drying time, worth buying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every dollar.
reviews.reviewText: Super fast shipping, arrived much sooner than expected & arrived in perfect condition. The hinges on the plastic lids are a little too strong and can bend the plastic; if you’re not careful, you might break it. Just make sure to lift the lid with care and try to not be too reckless where the hinges are & you should be fine. So far, it works amazing, I will update should anything go wrong, but I don’t believe it will. I’m very happy with how it works and the spinner definitely dries your laundry very well! It’s pretty quiet & not very noisy, even when spinning. The hoses were perfect & long. Everything came packaged neatly & it was super easy to set up & lift inside or lift anywhere. I will see how it puts up these next few months. :) I Would definitely consider buying this if you’re looking for a small, portable washing machine. It doesn’t take up much space at all & is great for a top floor unit as well. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars do not buy this item! reasons are below
reviews.reviewText: I've used this washer for a few weeks and it's already broke the water intake tube is broke the lint catcher thingy is broke it does not filter out lint there's lint stuck all over the clothes I have to sit here with a lint roller to get all the lint off my clothes before I can put them on pitiful pitiful design I do not recommend buying this item it does more harm than good trust me I'm crazy mad that there's lint on my clothes flying through the air up my nose on my furniture on my floor in my bed etc etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 Days in and VERY Satisfied
reviews.reviewText: UPDATED: 1/17/2024 -- My wash timer seems to only want to go as far as 12 minutes, not the full 15 minutes. I've tried re-positioning the dial handle on the spindle but the travel around the dial only seems to want to go 4/5 of the way around. Has anyone else experienced this?I may review again after more usage, but first impressions are great. It has satisfied all my needs. The washer side works well, and the spin side does really get the load 80-90% dry, as many have said. I'm still learning how much water to use, how much detergent to use, etc. I run a rinse cycle with vinegar rather than any fabric softner (a habit from my wife). I'm going to look at alternative detergents, and maybe even dryer sheets, just for that fresh washed smell.CONS: The fill tube is useless even with my faucet, so I have ordered one of the pet washing hoses with a stretchable connector to my bathroom sink faucet that I am using. Also, the floating lint catcher is useless as it keeps coming apart on every load. I will be looking for an alternative lint collector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MONEY WELL SPENT
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this machine it’s small but powerful washes great and spins the clothes almost completely dry. Perfect for a dorm studio or small apartment or even a mobile home. Not able to wash big blankets and things like that but it definitely cut back on my laundry costs and work overall.
